mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pro p INNER JOIN breed b ON p.pro_idx = b.pro_idx INNER JOIN breedtype bt ON b.breedType_code = bt.breedType_code where member_idx=#{idx}
select charType from pro p INNER JOIN `char` c ON p.pro_idx = c.pro_idx INNER JOIN chartype ct ON c.charType_code = ct.charType_code where p.pro_idx=2;
